text: is a Japanese professional wrestler. He competes under the ring name Abdullah Kobayashi which is a tribute to his trainer Abdullah the Butcher. He is best known for his time in Big Japan Pro Wrestling (BJW). He has also competed for Combat Zone Wrestling (CZW) where he appeared in the Tournament of Death IX. He made it to the second round but was defeated by JC Bailey. Kobayashi is best known for competing in brutal deathmatches. In mid-2013, Kobayashi took a long break from in-ring action to undergo treatment after he was diagnosed with hepatitis C. ==Championships== *Big Japan Pro Wrestling **BJW Deathmatch Heavyweight Championship (two times) **BJW World Tag Team Championship (four times) (with Kamikaze (one), Daikokubo Benkei (one), Jaki Numazawa (one) and Daisuke Sekimoto (one)) **WEW Hardcore Tag Team Championship (one time) (with Daikokubo Benkei) *Japan Indy Grand Prix **MVP Award (2012) *Tokyo Sports **Fighting Spirit Award (2012) ==References== ==Other websites== *BJW profile Category:1976 births Category:Japanese professional wrestlers Category:Living people Category:People from Nagano Prefecture
